meanings.definition: A dialect of French spoken in Quebec, characterized by its unique pronunciation and vocabulary.
meanings.sent1: In Quebec, you can hear people speaking joual in everyday conversations.
meanings.sent2: The joual dialect adds a special flavor to the French language in Quebec.
meanings.sent3: When learning French, some find joual amusing due to its distinct sounds.
meanings.sent4: The joual dialect paints a colorful linguistic picture of Quebec.
meanings.sent5: The unique sounds of joual make it stand out among other French dialects.

meanings.sent1: She became a joual after living in Quebec for many years.
meanings.sent2: The joual was proud of preserving the traditional language of Quebec.
meanings.sent3: Being a joual, he always had a unique way of expressing himself.
meanings.sent4: She was a joual, speaking with the distinct Quebecois accent.
meanings.sent5: The joual's love for the language was evident in every conversation.
